RekaDishMake the Most of Every Ingredient.

About RekaDish

Where simple cooking meets smart technology — built to help you make the most of every ingredient.

Our Story

RekaDish began with a simple idea: great food shouldn’t require expensive ingredients, complicated techniques, or hours in the kitchen. As a developer who loved experimenting in the kitchen, I often found myself overwhelmed by recipe websites full of clutter, ads, or unclear steps.

I wanted something better — clean, efficient, and built around the things home cooks actually need. So RekaDish was created with a mission to blend smart technology with practical cooking guidance, helping millions cook confidently at home.

Our Vision

We’re building a platform that makes cooking approachable, fun, and surprisingly simple — no matter your skill level. Our vision is to help people cook more at home, save money, reduce food waste, and feel inspired every single day.

Why the Name "RekaDish"?

**RekaDish** is a unique name that blends the English word "Dish" with the Māori word **"Reka,"** meaning **"tasty," "sweet," or "pleasant."**

We chose RekaDish because it succinctly captures our mission: providing a delightful, high-quality cooking experience (Reka) for every meal (Dish). It signifies that our recipes are vetted for maximum flavor and pleasure, making every dish a guaranteed success.

Our Mission

  • ✔ Make cooking simple, joyful, and accessible.
  • ✔ Deliver clear, step-by-step instructions.
  • ✔ Help home cooks save time and money.
  • ✔ Showcase recipes anyone can follow.
  • ✔ Build smart tools that help people cook better.

Where We’re Going

RekaDish is evolving into a complete cooking companion — offering personalized suggestions, meal planners, ingredient-matching recipes, and more. We're continuously improving, shaped by real user feedback and real cooking needs.

Thank you for being part of RekaDish. We're honored to help you cook something amazing today.
